VARIABLES.name: y_A1
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether Product A1 is produced

VARIABLES.name: y_A2
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether Product A2 is produced

VARIABLES.name: y_A3
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether Product A3 is produced

OBJECTIVE.query: p_A1 * x_A1 + p_A2 * x_A2 + p_A3 * x_A3
OBJECTIVE.LaTeX: \max Z = p_{A1} \cdot x_{A1} + p_{A2} \cdot x_{A2} + p_{A3} \cdot x_{A3}

CONSTRAINTS.description: The total production of A1, A2, A3 does not exceed 1,210 tons.
If the company decides to produce A1, then it must activate production the production lines at least 57 minutes to produce A1.
Product A1 can be produced at most 22 days.
If the company decides to produce A2, then it must activate production the production lines at least 57 minutes to produce A2.
Product A2 can be produced at most 22 days.
If the company decides to produce A3, then it must activate production the production lines at least 57 minutes to produce A3.
Product A3 can be produced at most 22 days.
Only one product can be produced at a time.
